title: It's a wonderful life at Woodland Trace! 1 Bed, 1 Bath, 895 SqFt!
posting_body: ['Woodland Trace', 'Bedroom: 1 | Bathroom: 1', 'Square Footage: 895 sq ft', 'Monthly Rent: $1444', 'show contact info', 'Community Description', "The living spaces at Woodland Trace Atlanta are thoughtfully designed with comfort and convenience in mind, and are stylishly appointed with the kind of premium materials and finishes you won't find in any other apartments for rent in Conyers, GA.", "There's plenty of shopping, dining, outdoor activities and more near Woodland Trace Atlanta.", "You'll love living in the Conyers location!", 'The Savannah', 'Community Amenities', '➢ Concierge', '➢ Courtesy Patrol', '➢ Fitness Area', '➢ Freeway Access', '➢ Front Door Trash Pickup', '➢ Gated Community', '➢ Laundry Facilities', '➢ Pet Park', '➢ Porch', '➢ Sundeck', '➢ 2 Community Playgrounds', '➢ 2 Sparkling Pools', '➢ Coffee Concierge', '➢ Controlled Gated Access', '➢ Courtesy Patrol', '➢ Maintenance on site', '➢ Online Services', '➢ Package Service', '➢ Property Manager on Site', '➢ Public Transportation', 'Unit Features', '➢ Breakfast Bar', '➢ Cable Ready', '➢ Dining Room', '➢ Dishwasher', '➢ Disposal', '➢ Oven/Range', '➢ Storage Units', '➢ Tub/Shower', '➢ Views', '➢ Window Coverings', '➢ Air Conditioning and Heating', '➢ Fireplaces in Select Units', '➢ High Speed Internet Access', '➢ Individual Climate Control', '➢ Patios or Balconies in Select Units', '➢ Refrigerator/Freezer', '➢ Renovated Apartment Homes Available', '➢ Upgraded Flooring in Select Units', '➢ Washer/Dryer Hookup', '➢ Wheelchair Accessible (Rooms)', 'Contact Information', 'Visit Us:', '1669 Iris Drive SE', 'Conyers, GA 30013', 'show contact info', 'Hours:', 'Mon - Fri: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Sat: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'Sun: 1:00 PM - 5:00 PM', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Additional Details', 'Pet Policy:', '$300 Pet Fee.', '$15 per month.', 'No aggressive breeds.', 'Lease Terms:', '12-Month', 'Management Company:', 'Ventron Management', 'Price is subject to change without prior notice', 'Prices are subject to change.', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '750F99ACAC9E48D8']
